bcbf4a4a-97d2-4bac-88d5-610e35295759.name: Battlesense
bcbf4a4a-97d2-4bac-88d5-610e35295759.notes: When Active: +1 to active defense rolls against sentient foes; 1 FP/min

e8209f10-ec0b-4b07-a1b2-8b49ef2235b0.name: Battlesense
e8209f10-ec0b-4b07-a1b2-8b49ef2235b0.notes: When Active: +2 to active defense rolls against sentient foes; 1 FP/min

1b07e3d5-3add-46cc-97ba-79196c752cd1.name: Battlesense
1b07e3d5-3add-46cc-97ba-79196c752cd1.notes: When Active: +3 to active defense rolls against sentient foes; 1 FP/min

91e7f55c-d25c-492d-958d-34d3692ae89d.name: Empathy
91e7f55c-d25c-492d-958d-34d3692ae89d.notes: Acts as Empathy (Accessibility, Not on Elder Things); 1 FP/use

7abb95b9-89de-45c6-b3f3-aadd15f10c21.name: Levitation
7abb95b9-89de-45c6-b3f3-aadd15f10c21.notes: Flight: Move 1, within 5' of horizontal surface

e4cd9a6b-c52e-4927-bb52-2fc1f22d13c6.name: Levitation
e4cd9a6b-c52e-4927-bb52-2fc1f22d13c6.notes: Flight: Basic Move, within 10' of horizontal surface

b9cbb0f2-1683-414a-8ee3-6eb9b0b1085c.name: Levitation
b9cbb0f2-1683-414a-8ee3-6eb9b0b1085c.notes: Flight: 2xBasic Move, within 10' of horizontal surface

129bd788-aad9-4ac1-b397-0f3527e63cc3.name: 25 Points chosen from the above or:

features.situation: from sapient being with whom you actively interact (converse, lecture, etc.)

17a00304-4f8c-456e-9ad3-93b38040d9df.name: Luck
17a00304-4f8c-456e-9ad3-93b38040d9df.notes: Usable once per hour of play

cca0b656-7dad-4f25-9622-ff0ac990ce6c.name: Magic Resistance
cca0b656-7dad-4f25-9622-ff0ac990ce6c.notes: -1/level to skill for others to cast a spell on you. +1/level to resist spells.

0aa788a7-75ad-4e84-bed2-05b517efa920.name: Resistance to Psionics
0aa788a7-75ad-4e84-bed2-05b517efa920.notes: -1/level to skill for others to use psionics on you. +1/level to resist psionic abilities.

d1e23d72-123b-424d-a209-a7aca55f293e.name: Signature Gear
d1e23d72-123b-424d-a209-a7aca55f293e.notes: For equipment normally bought with money, each point gives goods worth up to 50% of the average campaign starting wealth (but never cash).

features.situation: from con artists, politicians, salesmen, etc. – but only if you aren’t trying to manipulate them.

9524bb39-2304-4058-9c6b-419cc8529a61.name: Specialized
9524bb39-2304-4058-9c6b-419cc8529a61.notes: @Type: Angels, Demons, Elementals, Faerie, Ghosts, etc.@

58236775-dbfc-42ca-aa27-b0cb2aedd87b.name: Unfazeable
58236775-dbfc-42ca-aa27-b0cb2aedd87b.notes: Exempt from fright checks. Reaction modifiers do not affect you.

features.situation: from others who can hear your voice

2776c8ae-abd9-42c3-9616-707f82e5c5d5.name: Curious
2776c8ae-abd9-42c3-9616-707f82e5c5d5.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with an interesting item or situation

d1bab218-b99f-440f-b269-94ffa92b603b.name: Combat Paralysis
d1bab218-b99f-440f-b269-94ffa92b603b.notes: In any situation in which personal harm seems imminent, make a HT roll. Do not roll until the instant you need to fight, run, pull the trigger, or whatever. Any roll over 13 is a failure, even if you have HT 14+. On a success, you can act normally. On a failure, you are mentally stunned.

features.situation: toward those you are jealous of (may be as much as -4, at GM's discretion)

2849aacb-120e-42b9-b0b4-385988035187.name: Loner
2849aacb-120e-42b9-b0b4-385988035187.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever anyone lingers nearby, watches over your shoulder, etc. If you fail, you lash out at that person just as if you had Bad Temper.

c90dd3fa-73f8-431c-81c3-009702594c7c.name: Low Pain Threshold
c90dd3fa-73f8-431c-81c3-009702594c7c.notes: Double the shock from any injury. You roll at -4 to resist knockdown, stunning, and physical torture. Whenever you take a wound that does more than 1 HP of damage, you must make a Will roll to avoid crying out.

features.situation: from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident

afcc0aaf-5729-4586-98c5-7e50243c2014.name: Overconfidence
afcc0aaf-5729-4586-98c5-7e50243c2014.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are
toward any stranger and any “legitimate” reaction penalty (e.g., for an unfriendly race or nationality) is doubled

a9eacf8f-e534-4b8d-b8ab-c5862fe3ca31.name: Post-Combat Shakes
a9eacf8f-e534-4b8d-b8ab-c5862fe3ca31.notes: Make a self-control roll at the end of any battle. If you fail, roll 3d, add the amount by which you failed your self-control roll, and look up the result on the Fright Check Table.

1af48c55-7f10-4251-b469-06100f1c9ddf.name: Pyromania
1af48c55-7f10-4251-b469-06100f1c9ddf.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you have an opportunity to set a fire

4f7f4905-7dac-4adc-84b1-a24cb8e6bbd4.name: Selfish
4f7f4905-7dac-4adc-84b1-a24cb8e6bbd4.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces

ab18318b-676c-4017-8c05-f91121a407d2.name: Unfit
ab18318b-676c-4017-8c05-f91121a407d2.notes: -1 to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc. As well, you lose FP at twice the normal rate.

7b816620-2ea1-471b-ad03-104bf3f4bb19.name: -25 Points chosen from the above or:

features.situation: from victims of your intolerance (may be as much as -5, at GM's discretion)

82807326-7e58-4a61-bbe1-7ad93e543f6b.name: Obsession
82807326-7e58-4a61-bbe1-7ad93e543f6b.notes: Become a world-class psi at any cost; Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to deviate from your goal. If you fail, you continue to pursue your Obsession, regardless of the consequences.

67583caa-7904-4dbf-81d8-a6a388f55eab.name: Obsession
67583caa-7904-4dbf-81d8-a6a388f55eab.notes: Learn something dangerous involving Elder Things; Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to deviate from your goal. If you fail, you continue to pursue your Obsession, regardless of the consequences.

1002df74-e2e8-41de-9494-6ea6cab1456e.name: Choose 2, or raise Melee Weapon Skill by 1:

bb46bf69-5fe0-47ad-bb9a-b7ecebf4b796.name: Choose 7 or 1 point to buy anything from the above category:

ee67a450-602c-4163-a2bd-46bf40de4afa.name: Choose 4, or 2 points to raise one of those skills by a level
